title: Compute mean sleep hours for newborn babies

content.question: A sleep time of 15.9 hours per day for a newborn baby is at the 10th percentile of the distribution of sleep times for all newborn babies. Assuming the distribution is normal with standard deviation 0.5 hour, approximately what is the mean sleep time, in hours per day, for newborn babies?

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
